name: UserInterfaceSizeClass
desc: A set of values that indicate the visual size available to the view.

items.name: init?(UIUserInterfaceSizeClass)
items.desc: Creates a SwiftUI size class from the specified UIKit size class.

items.name: static func == (UserInterfaceSizeClass, UserInterfaceSizeClass) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two user interface size classes are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two user interface size classes are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the user interface size class by passing them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the user interface size class.
